resume: Inteha is the story of Sara, (Meera  — a young woman from a well-off background, studying at a liberal arts college. Being the introverted sort and romantically inclined, she's a dreamer. With a dad who dotes on his daughter, and a pacifist boyfriend , life just couldn't get any better for her. This all is shattered when circumstances force her to marry her feudal cousin . She finds her new home troublesome.
